snippet.title: Another Space Opera - Official Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Another Space Opera - Episode 1: The Wake Of The Giant 

Experience this gorgeous cinematic action platformer with a fast-paced and immersive feel. Rendered in, hand-crafted pixel art and featuring a full cast of voice-actors to bring this immense, epic sci-fi saga to life before your eyes.

Hack and blast your way through this breathtaking world in a tightly woven combination of gunplay, dodging, and melee fighting to make for a satisfying combat experience that is easy to learn but difficult to master.  Collect and make deadly use of countless procedurally generated weapons, each with their own unique stats, appearances, names, and features with which to annihilate your foes.

Coming to PC, PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch in 2023 A.D.
